definitions.definition: an amount of space between two things or people.
examples: I bicycled the short distance home

definitions.definition: the condition of being far off; remoteness.
the more remote part of what is visible or discernible.

examples: a distance of more than twenty years

definitions.definition: the full length of a race.
examples: he claimed the 10,000 meter title in only his second race over the distance

definitions.definition: the distance from the winning post that a horse must have reached when the winner finishes in order to qualify for a subsequent heat.
the scheduled length of a fight.
the avoidance of familiarity; aloofness or reserve.
examples: a mix of warmth and distance makes a good neighbor
synonyms: formality; informalstandoffishness "there is a distance between them"

definitions.definition: make (someone or something) far off or remote in position or nature.
examples: her mother wished to distance her from the rough village children
synonyms: put at a distance "he distanced himself from her"

definitions.definition: declare that one is not connected with or a supporter of (someone or something).
examples: he sought to distance himself from the proposals
